hive.model.energy.powercurve package¶

Submodules¶

hive.model.energy.powercurve.powercurve module¶

class hive.model.energy.powercurve.powercurve.Powercurve[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

a powertrain has a behavior where it calculate energy consumption in KwH

abstract get_id() → str[source]¶
abstract get_energy_type() → hive.model.energy.energytype.EnergyType[source]¶

gets the energy type of this Powertrain model :return: an energy type

abstract refuel(energy_source: EnergySource, charger: Charger, duration_seconds: pint.unit.build_unit_class.<locals>.Unit = <Quantity(1, 'second')>) → EnergySource[source]¶

(estimated) energy rate due to fueling, based on EnergySource :param energy_source: a vehicle’s source of energy :param charger: has a capacity scaling effect on the energy_rate :param duration_seconds: the amount of time to charge for :return: energy rate in KwH for charging with the current state of the EnergySource

Bases: hive.model.energy.powercurve.powercurve.Powercurve

builds a tabular, interpolated lookup model from a file for energy curves

get_id() → str[source]¶
get_energy_type() → hive.model.energy.energytype.EnergyType[source]¶

gets the energy type of this Powertrain model :return: an energy type

refuel(energy_source: EnergySource, charger: Charger, duration_seconds: s = <Quantity(1, 'second')>) → EnergySource[source]¶

(estimated) energy rate due to fueling, based on an interpolated tabular lookup model :param energy_source: a vehicle’s source of energy :param charger: has a capacity scaling effect on the energy_rate :param duration_seconds: the amount of time to charge for :return: energy rate in KwH for charging with the current state of the EnergySource

Module contents¶

hive.model.energy.powercurve.build_powercurve(name: str) → Union[OSError, hive.model.energy.powercurve.powercurve.Powercurve][source]¶

constructs EnergyCurve objects from file descriptions :param name: name of a valid energy curve type :return: an EnergyCurve, or, an error :raise IOError: if model file is invalid
